pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multidimensional Queries Enriched with Geographic Data // Multidimensional systems allow complex queries to be carried out in an easy way. The geographical dimension, together with the temporal dimension, plays a fundamental role in multidimensional systems. Through this package, vector geographic data layers can be associated to the attributes of geographic dimensions, so that the results of multidimensional queries can be obtained directly as vector layers. The multidimensional structures on which we can define the queries can be created from a flat table or imported directly using functions from this package.
